title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the purpose of this statement of prompt payment policy
of the Dormitory Authority to set forth the standards for the payment of bills
within specific periods of time and to prescribe interest penalties in
situations where payments do not conform to these standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4701.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
